meta.title: COH3 Stats - 英雄连3统计数据
meta.description: 英雄连3统计数据。排行榜、玩家卡片、历史比赛、单位统计、DPS计算器、战斗群探索器、武器探索器、当前实时游戏、最新COH3新闻、最新YouTube和Twitch直播。还有更多。

dpsCalculator.title: DPS Calculator
dpsCalculator.description: Compare DPS of all units in the game. Customize the unit load out with different weapons. You can also take into consideration the HP of the units.

unitBrowser.title: Unit Browser
unitBrowser.description: Explore game units, including stats, weapons, and upgrades. Navigate the Explorer menu for faction overview and more details.

twitch.title: Twitch直播
twitch.noStreams: No English speaking streams are currently broadcasting on Twitch.
